channel.title: Posts on Elena's Corner of Shame
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Elena's Corner of Shame

item.title: Rice and the Desktop
item.description: I’m currently in the process of customizing my linux desktop, what the cool kids call “ricing.” It’s fun but I feel I need to lay out the whole process, and what I want to do somewhere, so like a sane person I spun up a blog to write it out on. Honestly this post is mostly for me, but if you want to learn about ricing, look at this other person’s post. So anyway, let’s get on with it!

item.title: My First Post
item.description:
This is my first post!

Hi Ellie!
